title: Land for Sale at Fernando Road Marawila
details:
480 perches
300 Meters from Colombo Puttalam Main Road
well water, three phase electricity
pleasing surroundings and wide roads
close to Church, Schools, Base Hospital Marawila
St, Ann’s Nursing Home & Tourist Hotels
walking distance to the beach.

Ideal for Holiday Home Project, International
School, Hospital, Ayurvedic Resort, Elders Home,
Children’s Home, Garment Factory, Ware House
